metadata.title: CVE-2024-36048 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: QAbstractOAuth in Qt Network Authorization in Qt before 5.15.17, 6.x before6.2.13, 6.3.x through 6.5.x before 6.5.6, and 6.6.x through 6.7.x before6.7.1 uses only the time to seed the PRNG, which may result in guessablevalues.

criterions.comment: qtnetworkauth-everywhere-src package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
